item.title: Projects
item.description: Alana network [TBA]: Framework for self hosting private overlay networks with custom alana nodes such as authoritative DNS server, multiple cli tools to manage and deploy new nodes, web servers with automatic domain and TLS generated, a custom P2P chat with nodes discovery and more. All in a private and secure distributed network. Requester [Github]: A lightweight concurrent test tool for HTTP requests status codes following its redirects. NGINX Signed URL CDN node [Github]: Multi config file NGINX created as an Alana Network node for easy standard setup for web hosting, reverse proxying and edge CDN content sharing.
